content: I'm glad you could help me with some game recommendations. I've been playing video games a lot lately, and I'm always looking for new games to play. By the way, speaking of PC gaming, I recently built a new gaming PC with my friend's help, and it's been handling demanding games like Cyberpunk 2077 and Assassin's Creed Valhalla with ease. Do you think any of the games you recommended would be a good fit for my new PC?
